FuncDef:
The server-port command configures the number of a port to be listened by gRPC server.
The undo server-port command restores the default configuration. The server-port command configures the number of a port to be listened by gRPC server. The undo server-port command restores the default configuration. By default, port 57400 is listened by gRPC server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of a port to be listened.
The value is an integer ranging from 10000 to 57999.

ExtraInfo: If a collector functioning as a client initiates a connection to a device functioning as a server, the data sampled is dynamically subscribed to. In this case, you can run the server-port command to configure a server port to be listened. A connection can then be established between the server and client.
